addons.name: Generic Album Scraper
addons.description: Searches for album information and artwork across multiple websites.
addons.news: - add album 3dthumb image support

addons.name: Universal Album Scraper
addons.description:
This scraper collects information from the following supported sites: MusicBrainz, last.fm, allmusic.com and amazon.de, while grabs artwork from: fanart.tv, last.fm and allmusic.com. It can be set field by field that from which site you want that specific information.

The initial search is always done on MusicBrainz. In case allmusic and/or amazon.de links are not added on the MusicBrainz site, fields from allmusic.com and/or amazon.de cannot be fetched (very easy to add those missing links though).

addons.name: Generic Artist Scraper
addons.description: Searches for artist information and artwork across multiple websites.
addons.news: - add wikipedia support

addons.name: Universal Artist Scraper
addons.description:
This scraper collects information from the following supported sites: TheAudioDb.com, MusicBrainz, last.fm, and allmusic.com, while grabs artwork from: fanart.tv, htbackdrops.com, last.fm and allmusic.com. It can be set field by field that from which site you want that specific information.

The initial search is always done on MusicBrainz. In case allmusic link is not added on the MusicBrainz site fields from allmusic.com cannot be fetched (very easy to add those missing links though).

addons.name: 2SF Audio Decoder
addons.description:
To support game audio file used by some Nintendo DS games.

Dual Screen Sound Format is an audio format based on PSF. It stores audio ripped from the ROMs of Nintendo DS games. Music instructions are stored in files with a .2sflib extension and the music notation is stored in files with a .mini2sf extension.

addons.name: ASAP Audio Decoder
addons.description: ASAP (Another Slight Atari Player) plays on Kodi and converts 8-bit Atari music (*.sap, *.cmc, *.mpt, *.rmt, *.tmc, ...) on modern computers and mobile devices.

addons.name: DUMB Audio Decoder
addons.description:
DUMB is a module audio renderer library. It reads module files and outputs audio that can be dumped to the actual audio playback library.

On Kodi Supports playback of the following module formats:
- IT (Impulse Tracker)
- XM (Fasttracker II)
- S3M (Scream Tracker 3)
addons.disclaimer: 建议使用“OpenMPT 音频解码器”插件代替此插件。
addons.lifecyclestate: 替换为 audiodecoder.openmpt 插件！但是，在这里仍然可用。

addons.name: GME Audio Decoder
addons.description:
Game Music Emu (GME) format is used to emulate the audio output of various video game consoles popular in the 1980s and 1990s. It gives a "retro" feel to the sound.

Note:
Not all file formats give length and in this case it is set to 2.5 minutes.

Supported Formats:
- AY: ZX Spectrum/Amstrad CPC
- GBS: Nintendo Game Boy
- GYM: Sega Genesis/Mega Drive
- HES: NEC TurboGrafx-16/PC Engine
- KSS: MSX Home Computer/other Z80 systems (no FM sound)
- NSF/NSFE: Nintendo NES/Famicom (with VRC 6, Namco 106, and FME-7 sound)
- SAP: Atari systems using POKEY sound chip
- SPC: Super Nintendo/Super Famicom
- VGM/VGZ: Sega Master System/Mark III, Sega Genesis/Mega Drive,BBC Micro

addons.name: GSF Audio Decoder
addons.description: GSF is a addon for Kodi which adds the ability to play Game Boy Advance music files, the GSF format (MINIGSF and GSFLIB files). This player is based on the Visual Boy Advanced emulator, although the sound quality appears to be identical to Highly Advanced.

addons.name: HivelyTracker Audio Decoder
addons.description: Hively Tracker is a tracker program based upon the AHX format created in the mid '90s by Dexter and Pink of Abyss. The format was relatively popular, and many songs were created and used in scene productions and games. AHX was designed to create a very SID-like sound on the Amiga.

addons.name: Modplug Audio Decoder
addons.description:
Plays MOD files and few other formats.

It is recommended to use "OpenMPT Audio Decoder" addon instead of this one.
addons.lifecyclestate: 替换为 audiodecoder.openmpt 插件！但是，在这里仍然可用。

addons.name: NCSF Audio Decoder
addons.summary: NCSF (Nitro Composer Sound Format) Audio Decoder
addons.description:
Adds decoding support for Nitro Composer Sound Format files (.NCSF/.MININCSF).

Nitro Composer Sound Format (NCSF) is a PSF-style for Nintendo DS music, specifically music that was created via Nitro Composer, a tracker-like composer that is part of Nintendo's Nitro SDK for the Nintendo DS.
addons.snippet: NCSF (Nitro Composer Sound Format) Audio Decoder

addons.name: Nosefart Audio Decoder
addons.description: The Nintendo Sound Format (NSF) is a container format, that holds audio code ripped from the ROMs of games for the Nintendo Entertainment System. The NES had a pretty good sound engine for its time supporting 2 pulse-waves, 1 triangle wave, a noise channel, and DPCM channel which is a raw 7-bit counter raw sample playback.

addons.name: OpenMPT Audio Decoder
addons.description:
OpenMPT (short hand for Open ModPlug Tracker) is completely free and his library allows you play back some great music on your Kodi.

It supports loading of IT (Impulse Tracker), XM (FastTracker Extended Module), MOD (ProTracker and similar), S3M (Scream Tracker 3) and MPTM (its own file format) files, imports many more module and sample file formats.

See his website for complete list of supported types.

addons.name: Org Audio Decoder
addons.description:
Organya is a music format used in "Cave Story", created by the Japanese programmer "Pixel". As well as being used in the original game, there is a large and active Cave Story fan community which creates music in this format, both for standalone to play and for use in mods for the game.

This addon allows playing of .ORG files for this format.

addons.name: PSF Audio Decoder
addons.description: Adds decoding support for Sony Playstation Sound Format files (.PSF/.MINIPSF).

addons.name: QSF Audio Decoder
addons.description:
Adds decoding support for Capcom QSound Sound Format files (.QSF/.MINIQSF).

QSound is the original name for a positional three-dimensional (3D) sound processing algorithm from QSound Labs that creates 3D audio effects from multiple monophonic sources and sums the outputs to two channels for presentation over regular stereo speakers.

addons.name: SACD ISO support
addons.description:
This addon allows Kodi to read content from a Super Audio CD ISO image.

Super Audio CD (SACD) is a read-only optical disc format for audio storage, introduced in 1999, developed jointly by Sony and Philips Electronics to be the successor to the Compact Disc.

The SACD format offers more audio channels (e.g. surround sound), a higher bit rate, and longer playing time than a conventional CD.

addons.name: Sidplay Audio Decoder
addons.description:
Sound Interface Device (SID) is a format that houses Commodore 64 and 128 music.

This is a addon that implements the emulation of the C64's SID chip (MOS 6581) and CPU (6510) by .SID or .SIDSTREAM files.

addons.name: SPC Audio Decoder
addons.description: The SPC format holds Super Nintendo (SNES) game music. It is named after Sony's SPC700 contribution to the SNES's S-SMP audio chip. The SNES was a major jump in audio technology from the NES allowing for stereo sound, more channels, and fully sampled instruments.

addons.name: SSF/DSF Audio Decoder
addons.description: Sega Saturn Sound Format (SSF) and Dreamcast Sound Format (DSF) is an audio format based on PSF. It stores audio ripped from the ROMs of Sega Saturn and Sega Dreamcast games.

addons.name: Timidity Audio Decoder
addons.description:
TiMidity is a software synthesizer that can play MIDI files without a hardware synthesizer.

To use TiMidity you need a working timidity.cfg config file or sound fonts. Copy this files into the directory you intend to store and select it in the Add-on Settings.

addons.name: USF Audio Decoder
addons.summary: USF - Nintendo Ultra 64 Sound Format Decoder
addons.description: This is a decoder which adds support for playing (Ultra) Nintendo 64 Sound format (.USF/.MINIUSF) files.
addons.snippet: USF - Nintendo Ultra 64 Sound Format Decoder

addons.name: VGM Audio Decoder
addons.description: Video Game Music (VGM) Audio Decoder is a library for playing a wide variety of audio formats used in video games.

addons.name: WSR Audio Decoder
addons.description: WonderSwan R (WSR) is a container format, that holds audio code ripped from the ROMs of games for the WonderSwan and WonderSwan Color handheld game system. Both the original and color versions used the same audio chip which could handle 4 PCM audio channels.

addons.name: YM Audio Decoder
addons.description: YM (YM2149 Music) is an audio format that logs instructions sent to an AY-3-8910 or YM2149 chip. Playback occurs by emulating the chips and sending the logged data to them. Because the format merely logs the instructions to the chip, it doesn't preserve the original content of the music format.

addons.name: Flac Audio Encoder
addons.description:
FLAC stands for Free Lossless Audio Codec, an audio format similar to MP3, but lossless, meaning that audio is compressed in FLAC without any loss in quality. This is similar to how Zip works, except with FLAC you will get much better compression because it is designed specifically for audio, and you can play back compressed FLAC files in your favorite player (or your car or home stereo, see supported devices) just like you would an MP3 file.

FLAC stands out as the fastest and most widely supported lossless audio codec, and the only one that at once is non-proprietary, is unencumbered by patents, has an open-source reference implementation, has a well documented format and API, and has several other independent implementations.

addons.name: Lame MP3 Audio Encoder
addons.summary: LAME is a high quality MPEG Audio Layer III (MP3)
addons.description: It use LAME, the high quality MPEG Audio Layer III (MP3) encoder licensed under the LGPL.
addons.snippet: LAME is a high quality MPEG Audio Layer III (MP3)

addons.name: Vorbis Audio Encoder
addons.description: Vorbis is a general purpose perceptual audio CODEC intended to allow maximum encoder flexibility, thus allowing it to scale competitively over an exceptionally wide range of bitrates.

addons.name: Wav Audio Encoder
addons.description: WAV (Waveform Audio Format) is an uncompressed sound format.

addons.name: Switchback
addons.summary: Switchback is a Kodi utility for fast switching between recently played media.
addons.description:
Kodi utility for fast switching between recently played media.
Keeps a list of recently played videos.
The primary intended use is to make for super easy Switchback between two in progress video. See Wiki for usage notes including how to bind remote/keyboard controls for instant Switchback.
Consider this scenario:
* You're watching 'video A' with your partner. You're interrupted, and your partner needs to tend to the kids/howl at the moon.
* You navigate to 'video B' and watch some of that while you're waiting.
* Your partner comes back.
* You hit your one button 'Switchback' and 'video A' instantly starts playing again - no need for tedious navigation etc.
* You're interrupted, again! The moon really is so very bright tonight. Hit your 'Switchback' button to instantly resume 'video B', again with no tedious navigation.
addons.news:
v2.0.0 Re-write!
- Support addons
- Support PVR live/recordings
- (Remove music support)
- Add context menus (configurable)
- Better artwork support
- Better notifications
- Filter watched items from list (configurable)
addons.snippet: Switchback is a Kodi utility for fast switching between recently played media.

addons.name: Timers
addons.description:
A powerful timer addon with the following features
* Unlimited timer slots. All of them can be quickly set up by using context menu
* single-click-setup for sleep and doze timers
* Timers can play any resource that it available in KODI, e.g. music folders, video files, TV/radio programs, slideshows, resources from 3rd party plugins, e.g. Zattoo channels.
* Timers can be set from TV / Radio EPG, One-click-setup from epg (Quick Timer)
* Different schedule modes: once, everyday, Mon-Fri, Fri-Sat, Sat-Sun, Sun-Thu, Mon-Thu, specific weekday and many more
* Date change is supported, e.g. from 23:30 (p.m.) until 1:30 (a.m.)
* Shuffle, repeat, 2 end modes, i.e. duration or specific time
* Smart shuffle mode for slideshows that tries to find folder that fits into timeframe randomly
* Actions related to media: start media and stop at end, just start media, start media at end, stop media immediately, stop media at end, power down system
* Linear fading in timer period: fade-in, fade-out, no fading. Min and max volume can be set for each timer
* Custom label for timer
* After KODI startup timers, that are in period, start retroactively although KODI was not running at start time. Fading volume is calculated correctly.
* Feature in order to prevent that display is turned off if KODI idles but is not in full screen mode
* MS Windows only: Feature in order to prevent that Windows displays lock screen if KODI idles

addons.description: The Flirc USB receiver lets you use any remote control with Kodi. Find out more at flirc.tv!

addons.name: Game Boy
addons.description: The Nintendo Game Boy is an 8-bit handheld video game console released in 1989. It became a tremendous success, and in 2009 was inducted into the National Toy Hall of Fame.
addons.disclaimer: 图片来源：OpenEmu（openemu.org）

addons.name: Game Boy Advance
addons.description: The Nintendo Game Boy Advance is a 32-bit handheld video game console released in 2001. Despite fierce competition, Nintendo maintained a majority market share with the device.
addons.disclaimer: 图片来源：OpenEmu（openemu.org）

addons.name: Genesis 4 Way Play
addons.description: The 4 Way Play is a four-port peripheral for the Sega Genesis, released in 1993 by Electronic Arts. It was mainly supported by games released by EA itself.

addons.name: Genesis Controller (3-Button)
addons.description: The original controller for the Sega Genesis was released in 1988. It had three main face buttons. Sega released a six-button version in 1993.

addons.name: Genesis Controller (6-Button)
addons.description: The original controller for the Sega Genesis was released in 1988. It had three main face buttons. Sega released a six-button version in 1993.
addons.disclaimer: 图片来源：OpenEmu（openemu.org）

addons.name: Genesis Mouse
addons.description: The Sega Mouse is a ball mouse for the Sega Mega Drive/Genesis released in 1993. It was intended to be used for art creation software.

addons.name: Genesis Team Player
addons.description: The Team Player is a peripheral released in 1993 by Sega for the Sega Genesis. It allows up to four players to connect Genesis controllers.

addons.name: Gravis PC Gamepad
addons.description: The Gravis gamepad is a controller produced by Advanced Gravis Computer Technology in 1991. It was the first gamepad for the IBM PC in a market dominated by joysticks.

addons.name: IBM Model M Keyboard
addons.description: The IBM Model M keyboard, introduced in 1984, is regarded as a timeless and durable piece of hardware.
addons.disclaimer: 图片来源：维基百科（Wikipedia.org）

addons.name: Intellivision Controller
addons.description: The Intellivision, a portmanteau of "intelligent television", was released by Mattel Electronics in 1979. In 2009, IGN named the Intellivision the 14th greatest console of all time.
addons.disclaimer: 图片来源：OpenEmu（openemu.org）

addons.name: Konami Justifier (Player 2)
addons.description: The Justifer is a light gun released by Konami in 1992 for the Sega Mega Drive/Genesis, SNES and PlayStation. It resembles the Colt Python, a .357 Magnum revolver.

addons.name: Konami Justifier (PS)
addons.description: The Justifer is a light gun released by Konami in 1992 for the Sega Mega Drive/Genesis, SNES and PlayStation. It resembles the Colt Python, a .357 Magnum revolver.

addons.name: Konami Justifier (SNES)
addons.description: The Justifer is a light gun released by Konami in 1992 for the Sega Mega Drive/Genesis, SNES and PlayStation. It resembles the Colt Python, a .357 Magnum revolver.

addons.name: MSX Joystick
addons.description: The MSX joystick featured A and B buttons and four-way directional control.
addons.disclaimer: 图片来源：Laurens Holst（www.grauw.nl）

addons.name: MSX Keyboard
addons.description: The MSX keyboard came in internal and external units. One troubleshooting hint when an MSX machine does not display an image is to press the CAPS key repeatedly to see if the LED toggles.
addons.disclaimer: 图片来源：维基百科（Wikipedia.org）

addons.name: Neo Geo Controller
addons.description: The controller for the Neo Geo AES (Advanced Entertainment System), a video game console released in the US in 1991. The Neo Geo AES was a niche system marketed toward high-end consumers. The console was expensive, as were the games themselves, which could go for hundreds of dollars.

addons.name: Neo Geo Pocket
addons.description: The Neo Geo Pocket was a handheld console with a monochrome screen released by SNK in 1998. It was generally unsuccessful and in 1999 was replaced by the Neo Geo Pocket Color to better compete with the Game Boy Color.
addons.disclaimer: 图片来源：OpenEmu（openemu.org）

addons.name: NES Controller
addons.description: The Nintendo Entertainment System, also known as the Famicom (for "Family Computer"), was released in 1983. The cross-shaped directional pad was designed for Game & Watch systems, replacing the bulkier joysticks found on earlier controllers.
addons.disclaimer: 图片来源：OpenEmu（openemu.org）

addons.name: NES Four Score
addons.description: The NES Four Score is a multitap accessory created by Nintendo in 1990. It allows for four-player gameplay.
addons.disclaimer: 图片来源：维基百科（Wikipedia.org）

addons.name: Nintendo 64 Controller
addons.description: The Nintendo 64 controller, released in 1996, featured a unique "M" shape design. Intense rotating of the analog stick during Mario Party reportedly caused burn injuries to some players.
addons.disclaimer: 图片来源：OpenEmu（openemu.org）

addons.name: Nintendo DS
addons.description: The Nintendo DS (short for "Dual Screen") is a 32-bit handheld video game console released in 2004. A DS Lite model was launched in 2006, followed by the DSi. Combined, these are the best selling handheld to date, and second best console (behind the PlayStation 2).
addons.disclaimer: 图片来源：OpenEmu（openemu.org）

addons.name: Nintendo GameCube Controller
addons.description: The Nintendo GameCube controller was released in 2001. The analog sticks and triggers were the target of a patent lawsuit, but Nintendo fought back and successfully won the case.
addons.disclaimer: 图片来源：OpenEmu（openemu.org）

addons.name: Nintendo Virtual Boy Controller
addons.description: The Virtual Boy is a 32-bit console released by Nintendo in 1995. While Nintendo promised a virtual reality experience, the red monochrome display and bulky table-mounted headset lead to a poor immersive experience.
addons.disclaimer: 图片来源：OpenEmu（openemu.org）

addons.name: Odyssey2 Controller
addons.description: The Odyssey², also known as the Videopac G7000, was released by Magnavox (now Philips) in 1978. All games produced by Magnavox/Philips ended with an exclamation point, such as K.C. Munchkin! and Kuller Bees!.
addons.disclaimer: 图片来源：OpenEmu（openemu.org）

addons.name: OSMC Remote
addons.description: This remote is the perfect way to control OSMC. Visit osmc.tv to learn more!

addons.name: OUYA Controller
addons.description: The OUYA is a crowd-funded Android-based microconsole released in 2013. The OUYA controller includes a single-touch touchpad in the center of the controller.

addons.name: PC Engine Controller
addons.description: The PC Engine, also known as the TurboGrafx-16, was released by Hudson Soft and NEC in 1987. It became the top-selling console in Japan, but trailed behind both Sega and Nintendo in the North American and Eurpoean markets.
addons.disclaimer: 图片来源：OpenEmu（openemu.org）

addons.name: PC Joystick (2-Button)
addons.description: The 2-button joystick was compatible with the Game Port, a device port found on IBM PCs throughout the 1980s and 1990s.

addons.name: PC Joystick (4-Button)
addons.description: The 4-button joystick was compatible with the Game Port, a device port found on IBM PCs throughout the 1980s and 1990s.

addons.name: PC-FX Controller
addons.description: The PC-FX is a 32-bit console released by NEC in 1994. Due to the high cost, underpowered graphics and lack of developer support, it sold poorly and was discontinued in 1998.
addons.disclaimer: 图片来源：OpenEmu（openemu.org）

addons.name: PC-FX Mouse
addons.description: The PC-FX mouse is a two-button ball mouse released in 1994. It is supported by strategy games like Farland Story FX and Power DoLLS FX.
addons.disclaimer: 图片来源：维基百科（Wikipedia.org）

addons.name: PlayStation Dual Analog
addons.description: The PlayStation controller was released by Sony Computer Entertainment in 1994. Sony briefly released the Dual Analog controller in 1997, followed by the rumble-enabled DualShock later that year.

addons.name: PlayStation DualShock
addons.description: The PlayStation controller was released by Sony Computer Entertainment in 1994. Sony briefly released the Dual Analog controller in 1997, followed by the rumble-enabled DualShock later that year.

addons.name: PlayStation Gamepad
addons.description: The PlayStation controller was released by Sony Computer Entertainment in 1994. Sony briefly released the Dual Analog controller in 1997, followed by the rumble-enabled DualShock later that year.

addons.name: PlayStation Guncon (Japan)
addons.description: The Guncon, known as G-Con in Europe, is a family of light guns designed by Namco for the PlayStation. The original model was released alongside the PlayStation in 1994.

addons.name: PlayStation Guncon (Western)
addons.description: The Guncon, known as G-Con in Europe, is a family of light guns designed by Namco for the PlayStation. The original model was released alongside the PlayStation in 1994.

addons.name: PlayStation Mouse
addons.description: The PlayStation Mouse is a two-button ball mouse. It was released alongside the PlayStation in 1994.

addons.name: PlayStation Multitap
addons.description: A multitap increases the number of controller and memory card ports, similar to a USB hub. With a second PlayStation Multitap, up to eight controllers and memory cards can be plugged in at once.

addons.name: Pokémini Controller
addons.description: The Pokémon Mini is a handheld game console that was designed and manufactured by Nintendo and themed around the Pokémon media franchise. It is the smallest game system with interchangeable cartridges ever produced by Nintendo, weighing just under two and a half ounces (71 grams).

addons.name: PSP
addons.description: The PlayStation Portable (PSP) was released by Sony in 2004. It was praised for its high-end GPU and bright 4.3 inch screen. The PSP was succeeded by the PSP Go in 2009, and then the PlayStation Vita in 2011.
addons.disclaimer: 图片来源：OpenEmu（openemu.org）

addons.name: Sega Arcade Racer
addons.description: The Arcade Racer, released in 1995, is a racing wheel style controller for the Sega Saturn.
addons.disclaimer: 图片来源：Sega Retro（segaretro.org）

addons.name: Sega Game Gear
addons.description: The Sega Game Gear is an 8-bit handheld video game console released in 1990. While it had a full-color backlit screen and fast processor, the battery life and large size were often criticized.
addons.disclaimer: 图片来源：OpenEmu（openemu.org）

addons.name: Sega Master System Controller
addons.description: The Master System, originally named the Mark III, was released by Sega in 1985. As of 2015, the Master System is the longest-lived game console due to its surging popularity in Brazil.
addons.disclaimer: 图片来源：OpenEmu（openemu.org）

addons.name: Sega Mission Stick
addons.description: The Sega Mission Stick is a fight stick for the Sega Saturn released in 1995. A second stick could be connected to allow twin sticks in Panzer Dragoon Zwei.
addons.disclaimer: 图片来源：Sega Retro（segaretro.org）

addons.name: Sega Mission Sticks
addons.description: The Sega Mission Stick is a fight stick for the Sega Saturn released in 1995. A second stick could be connected to allow twin sticks in Panzer Dragoon Zwei.
addons.disclaimer: 图片来源：Sega Retro（segaretro.org）

addons.name: Sega Saturn 3D (Japan)
addons.description: The Sega Saturn 3D Control Pad was released in 1996. It was Sega's answer to the revolutionary Nintendo 64 controller, which featured an analogue stick for greater precision in a 3D environment.
addons.disclaimer: 图片来源：维基百科（Wikipedia.org）

addons.name: Sega Saturn 3D (Western)
addons.description: The Sega Saturn 3D Control Pad was released in 1996. It was Sega's answer to the revolutionary Nintendo 64 controller, which featured an analogue stick for greater precision in a 3D environment.
addons.disclaimer: 图片来源：维基百科（Wikipedia.org）

addons.name: Sega Saturn 6 Player Adaptor
addons.description: A multitap increases the number of controller ports, similar to a USB hub. Released in 1995, the Saturn 6 Player Adaptor allowed up to 10 players in some games, such as Saturn Bomberman.
addons.disclaimer: 图片来源：维基百科（Wikipedia.org）

addons.name: Sega Saturn Controller
addons.description: The original controller for the Sega Saturn debuted in Japan in 1994. In North America and Europe, a different, much bulkier controller was released to supposedly accommodate for the "bigger hands" of western consumers.

addons.name: Sega SG-1000 Controller
addons.description: The SG-1000, also known as the Computer Videogame SG-1000, was Sega's first entry into the console business in 1983. However, due to market saturation and the Video Game Crash of 1983, it was not commercially successful.
addons.disclaimer: 图片来源：OpenEmu（openemu.org）

addons.name: Sega Shuttle Mouse
addons.description: The Shuttle Mouse, released in 1994, is an official mouse peripheral for the Sega Saturn. It was designed to be used with simulation-oriented games

addons.name: Sega Twin Stick
addons.description: The Sega Twin Stick, released in 1996, features two joysticks at the expense of fewer buttons. It was designed for the game Cyber Troopers Virtual-On.
addons.disclaimer: 图片来源：Sega Retro（segaretro.org）

addons.name: Sega Virtua Gun (European)
addons.description: The Virtua Gun was released for the Sega Saturn in 1995. Bright colors were used for western models due to fears that it could be linked with gun crime.
addons.disclaimer: 图片来源：Sega Retro（segaretro.org）

addons.name: Sega Virtua Gun (Japan)
addons.description: The Virtua Gun was released for the Sega Saturn in 1995. Bright colors were used for western models due to fears that it could be linked with gun crime.
addons.disclaimer: 图片来源：Sega Retro（segaretro.org）

addons.name: Sega Virtua Gun (US)
addons.description: The Virtua Gun was released for the Sega Saturn in 1995. Bright colors were used for western models due to fears that it could be linked with gun crime.
addons.disclaimer: 图片来源：Sega Retro（segaretro.org）

addons.name: SNES Controller
addons.description: The SNES (akso known as Super NES or Super Nintendo) is a 16-bit console released in 1990. The controller design served as inspiration for the PlayStation, Dreamcast, Xbox and Wii Classic controllers.
addons.disclaimer: 圖片來源：OpenEmu (openemu.org)

addons.name: SNES Mouse
addons.description: The SNES mouse was first released in 1992. It was originally designed for use with the game Mario Paint.

addons.name: Super Multitap
addons.description: A multitap increases the number of controller ports, similar to a USB hub. The Super Multitap was released by Hudson Soft in 1993 for use with the Bomberman games.

addons.name: Super Scope
addons.description: The Super Scope is a light gun for the SNES. It was released in 1992 as a successor to the NES Zapper.

addons.name: TV Remote
addons.description: A TV remote with basic navigational capabilities.

addons.name: Vectrex Controller
addons.description: The Vectrex was released in 1982 by General Consumer Electronics (later purchased by Milton Bradley). The console featured a built-in monochrome monitor capable of displaying vector graphics.
addons.disclaimer: 图片来源：OpenEmu（openemu.org）

addons.name: Wii Remote Controller
addons.description: The Wii Remote, also known colloquially as the Wiimote, is the primary game controller for the Nintendo Wii home video game console.
addons.disclaimer: 图片来源：open-joysick-display（https://github.com/RetroWeeb/open-joystick-display）根据 BSD 许可证+ 获得授权

addons.name: WonderSwan
addons.description: The WonderSwan is a 16-bit handheld console released in 1999 by Bandai. It is playable both vertically and horizontally, and was praised for its long battery life and unique library of games.
addons.disclaimer: 图片来源：OpenEmu（openemu.org）

addons.name: Xbox 360 Controller
addons.description: The Xbox 360 was introduced at E3 in 2005. The controller is known for its enduring comfort.

Join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile!

Use your arrow keys to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one!
addons.disclaimer: 由 Gabriele Cirulli 创作。基于 Veewo Studio 的 1024。

addons.name: Amstrad - CPC (CrocoDS)
addons.description: CrocoDS is an Amstrad CPC 6128 emulator based on Win-CPC. It was originally created for the Nintendo DS.

addons.name: Amstrad - CPC/GX4000 (Caprice32)
addons.description: Caprice32 is an emulator for the Amstrad CPC 8-bit home computer series. It faithfully imitates the CPC464, CPC664, and CPC6128 models.
addons.disclaimer: 作者：Ulrich Doewich

addons.name: Arcade (Daphne)
addons.description: DAPHNE is a multi-arcade LaserDisc emulator that lets one play the original LaserDisc version on a PC.

addons.name: Arcade (FB Alpha 2012 CPS-1)
addons.description: A port of FinalBurn Alpha 2012 to Libretro. This is the standalone core for Capcom CPS-1.

addons.name: Arcade (FB Alpha 2012 CPS-2)
addons.description: A port of FinalBurn Alpha 2012 to Libretro. This is the standalone core for Capcom CPS-2.

addons.name: Arcade (FB Alpha 2012 CPS-3)
addons.description: A port of FinalBurn Alpha 2012 to Libretro. This is the standalone core for Capcom CPS-3.

addons.name: Arcade (FB Alpha 2012 Neo Geo)
addons.description: A port of FinalBurn Alpha 2012 to Libretro. This is the standalone core for Neo Geo.

addons.name: Arcade (FB Alpha 2012)
addons.description:
FinalBurn Alpha is an emulator of arcade games, including Capcom CPS-1 and CPS-2, SNK Neo-Geo, Toaplan, Cave and Sega System 16.

The 2012 version runs better on older hardware.
addons.disclaimer: FB Alpha 的作者不保证其适用于任何目的（暗示或其他），也不承担使用 FB Alpha 时可能发生的任何损害的责任。FB Alpha 模拟的所有游戏，包括其中的任何图像和声音，均由其各自的版权所有者版权所有。图标来源：TRIPLEKILLZ（triplekillz.deviantart.com）

addons.name: Arcade (FB Alpha)
addons.lifecycle: This add-on has been discontinued. Use FBNeo.
addons.description: FinalBurn Alpha is an emulator of arcade games, including Capcom CPS-1 and CPS-2, SNK Neo-Geo, Toaplan, Cave and Sega System 16.
addons.disclaimer: 아이콘 크레딧: TRIPLEKILLZ(triplekillz.deviantart.com)
addons.lifecyclestate: This add-on has been discontinued. Use FBNeo.

addons.name: Arcade (FinalBurn Neo)
addons.description:
FinalBurn Neo is a fork of FinalBurn Alpha, an emulator of arcade games.

FB Neo emulation includes Capcom CPS-1 and CPS-2, SNK Neo-Geo, Toaplan, Cave and Sega System 16.
addons.disclaimer: 图标来源：TRIPLEKILLZ（triplekillz.deviantart.com）

addons.name: Arcade (HBMAME)
addons.description: HBMAME stands for Home Brew MAME. It is an emulator of homebrew and hacked games for arcade hardware.

addons.name: Arcade (MAME 2000)
addons.description: 2000 version of MAME (0.37b5) for libretro. Compatible with iMAME4All/MAME4Droid/MAME 0.37b5 sets.

addons.name: Arcade (MAME 2003 Midway)
addons.description: Supported files: .zip

addons.name: Arcade (MAME 2003)
addons.description: MAME 0.78 for libretro. Compatible with MAME 0.78 sets.

addons.name: Arcade (MAME 2003-Plus)
addons.description: Updated 2003 version of MAME (0.78) for libretro, with added support for over 350 additional games plus many fixes and improvements.

addons.name: Arcade (MAME 2010)
addons.description: Late 2010 version of MAME (0.139) for libretro. Compatible with MAME 0.139 sets.

addons.name: Arcade (MAME 2014)
addons.description: Supported files: .chd, .cmd, .zip, .7z

addons.name: Arcade (MAME 2015)
addons.description: Supported files: .chd, .cmd, .zip, .7z

addons.name: Atari - 2600 (Stella)
addons.description:
Stella is a multi-platform Atari 2600 VCS emulator.

The Atari 2600 Video Computer System (VCS), introduced in 1977, was the most popular home video game system of the early 1980s.
addons.disclaimer: Stella 最初由 Bradford W.Mott 为 Linux 开发，目前由 Stephen Anthony 维护。

addons.name: Atari - 400/800/600XL/800XL/130XE/5200 (Atari800)
addons.description: Atari800 is an emulator for Atari 8-bit computer systems (400, 800, 600 XL, 800XL, 130XE and 5200).

addons.name: Atari - 5200 (a5200)
addons.description:
a5200 is a port of the Atari 5200 emulator to libretro.

Originally developed for the GCW Zero, this core runs fast on low-powered hardware.

addons.name: Atari - 7800 (ProSystem)
addons.description:
ProSystem is an Atari 7800 emulator.

Place 7800 BIOS (U).rom (optional) in the emulator's userdata folder.

addons.name: Atari - Jaguar (Virtual Jaguar)
addons.description:
Virtual Jaguar is an emulator for the Atari Jaguar video game console.

Based on code released by David Raingeard (Cal2) of what used to be Potato Emulation.

addons.name: Atari - Lynx (Beetle Lynx)
addons.description: Beetle Lynx is the Atari Lynx module of Beetle, a fork of Mednafen. The Mednafen module is a fork of Handy.

addons.name: Atari - Lynx (Handy)
addons.description: Handy is an Atari Lynx emulator by K. Wilkins for Windows 95/98/NT/2000/XP.

addons.name: Atari - ST/STE/TT/Falcon (Hatari)
addons.description:
Hatari is an Atari ST/STE/TT/Falcon emulator.

Hatari tries to emulate the hardware as close as possible for greater compatibility. Because of this, it may be slower than less accurate emulators.

addons.name: Bandai - WonderSwan/Color (Beetle Cygne)
addons.lifecycle: This add-on has been renamed from Cygne to Beetle Wonderswan.
addons.description: Standalone port of Mednafen WonderSwan to libretro, itself a fork of Cygne.
addons.lifecyclestate: This add-on has been renamed from Cygne to Beetle Wonderswan.

addons.name: Bandai - WonderSwan/Color (Beetle Wonderswan)
addons.description:
Standalone port of Mednafen WonderSwan to libretro, itself a fork of Cygne.

Supported files: .ws, .wsc, .pc2

addons.name: Cannonball
addons.description:
Cannonball is an enhanced version of the seminal arcade racer OutRun designed by Yu Suzuki in 1986.

Note: OutRun Revision B files are needed. See the file roms needed.txt.

addons.name: Cave Story (NXEngine)
addons.description: NXEngine is a complete open-source clone/rewrite of the masterpiece jump-and-run platformer Doukutsu Monogatari (also known as Cave Story).

addons.name: ChaiLove
addons.description:
ChaiLove is a 2D game framework inspired by the Love2D API.

See https://github.com/libretro/libretro-chailove for a list of games that are available in ChaiLove.

addons.name: Coleco - ColecoVision (Gearcoleco)
addons.description: Gearcoleco is an open source, cross-platform, ColecoVision emulator.

addons.name: Commodore - Amiga (PUAE)
addons.description:
UAE stands for the Ubiquitous Amiga Emulator.

Most games require a version of the Amiga Kickstart ROM. However, some old games will work with the built-in ROM emulation.

addons.name: Commodore - C128 (VICE x128)
addons.description: VICE stands for the Versatile Commodore Emulator. The current version emulates the C64, the C64DTV, the C128, the VIC20, practically all PET models, the PLUS4 and the CBM-II (aka C610/C510).

addons.name: Commodore - C64 (Frodo)
addons.description: Frodo is a free and portable emulator for the Commodore 64, an 8-bit home computer introduced in 1982 by Commodore International.

addons.name: Commodore - C64 (VICE x64, fast)
addons.description: VICE stands for the Versatile Commodore Emulator. The current version emulates the C64, the C64DTV, the C128, the VIC20, practically all PET models, the PLUS4 and the CBM-II (aka C610/C510).

addons.name: Commodore - C64 (VICE x64, fast)
addons.description: VICE stands for the Versatile Commodore Emulator. The current version emulates the C64, the C64DTV, the C128, the VIC20, practically all PET models, the PLUS4 and the CBM-II (aka C610/C510).
addons.lifecyclestate: This add-on has been renamed.

addons.name: Commodore - C64 (VICE x64sc, accurate)
addons.description: VICE stands for the Versatile Commodore Emulator. The current version emulates the C64, the C64DTV, the C128, the VIC20, practically all PET models, the PLUS4 and the CBM-II (aka C610/C510).

addons.name: Commodore - C64 SuperCPU (VICE xscpu64)
addons.description: VICE stands for the Versatile Commodore Emulator. The current version emulates the C64, the C64DTV, the C128, the VIC20, practically all PET models, the PLUS4 and the CBM-II (aka C610/C510).

addons.name: Commodore - C64DTV (VICE x64dtv)
addons.description: VICE stands for the Versatile Commodore Emulator. The current version emulates the C64, the C64DTV, the C128, the VIC20, practically all PET models, the PLUS4 and the CBM-II (aka C610/C510).

addons.name: Commodore - CBM-II 5x0 (VICE xcbm5x0)
addons.description: VICE stands for the Versatile Commodore Emulator. The current version emulates the C64, the C64DTV, the C128, the VIC20, practically all PET models, the PLUS4 and the CBM-II (aka C610/C510).

addons.name: Commodore - CBM-II 6x0/7x0 (VICE xcbm2)
addons.description: VICE stands for the Versatile Commodore Emulator. The current version emulates the C64, the C64DTV, the C128, the VIC20, practically all PET models, the PLUS4 and the CBM-II (aka C610/C510).

addons.name: Commodore - PET (VICE xpet)
addons.description: VICE stands for the Versatile Commodore Emulator. The current version emulates the C64, the C64DTV, the C128, the VIC20, practically all PET models, the PLUS4 and the CBM-II (aka C610/C510).

addons.name: Commodore - PLUS/4 (VICE xplus4)
addons.description: VICE stands for the Versatile Commodore Emulator. The current version emulates the C64, the C64DTV, the C128, the VIC20, practically all PET models, the PLUS4 and the CBM-II (aka C610/C510).

addons.name: Commodore - VIC-20 (VICE xvic)
addons.description: VICE stands for the Versatile Commodore Emulator. The current version emulates the C64, the C64DTV, the C128, the VIC20, practically all PET models, the PLUS4 and the CBM-II (aka C610/C510).

addons.name: Dinothawr
addons.description:
Dinothawr is a block-pushing puzzle game on slippery surfaces.

It is your task to free the dinosaur hero's friends from their ice prison.

addons.name: Doom (PrBoom)
addons.description:
PrBoom, short for "Professor Boom", is a version of the classic 3D shoot'em'up game Doom, originally written by id Software.

See the documentation for a list of required files.

addons.name: Doom 3 (boom3)
addons.description:
boom3 is a source code port of the Doom 3 codebase.

See the documentation for a list of required files.

addons.name: DOS (DOSBox)
addons.description:
DOSBox emulates an IBM PC compatible computer running MS-DOS.

DOSBox can be configured to run a wide range of DOS games, from CGA/Tandy/PCjr classics up to games from the Quake era.

addons.name: DOS (DOSBox-Pure)
addons.description: DOSBox Pure is a new fork of DOSBox built for RetroArch/Libretro aiming for simplicity and ease of use.

addons.name: Elektronika - BK-0010/BK-0011(M)
addons.description: BK is an emulator for the Soviet Electronica BK series: БК-0010, БК-0010.01, and БК-0011(M).

addons.name: Enterprise - 64/128 (ep128emu)
addons.description: ep128emu is a portable emulator of the Enterprise 64/128, ZX Spectrum 48/128, and Amstrad CPC 464/664/6128 computers.

addons.name: Fairchild ChannelF (FreeChaF)
addons.description: FreeChaF is a libretro emulation core for the Fairchild ChannelF / Video Entertainment System designed for joypad compatibility.

addons.name: Flashback (REminiscence)
addons.description:
REminiscence is a rewrite of the engine used in the 1992 game Flashback from Delphine Software.

The game data files (DOS, PC-CD, Amiga, Macintosh) are required.

addons.name: Galaksija (galaxy-libretro)
addons.description: Galaxy emulates the Galaksija built-it-yourself computer designed by Voja Antonićin in Yogoslavia in 1983.
addons.disclaimer: 图片来源：TomažŠolc

addons.name: Game Music Emu
addons.description: Port of blargg's Game Music Emu library.

addons.name: GCE - Vectrex (vecx)
addons.description: Vecx is a Vectrex video game system emulator. It can run most Vectrex software.
addons.disclaimer: 作者：Richard Bannister

addons.name: Gong
addons.description: Gong is a libretro port of Pong. It is based on Brad Parker's version of Pong.
addons.disclaimer: Dan Zaidan 的原始源代码 - https://danzaidan.itch.io

addons.name: Handheld Electronic (GW)
addons.description: GW is a Game & Watch simulator.

addons.name: Libretro Compatibility
addons.summary: Libretro compatibility layer for Kodi's Game API
addons.description: This add-on provides a wrapper for libretro cores, allowing them to be loaded as game add-ons.
addons.snippet: Libretro compatibility layer for Kodi's Game API

addons.name: Lua Engine (Lutro)
addons.description: Lutro is an experimental Lua game framework for libretro inspired by LÖVE.

addons.name: Mac II (minivmac)
addons.description: Mini vMac is an emulator for the Macintosh Plus, a computer sold by Apple from 1984 to 1996.

addons.name: Magnavox - Odyssey2 / Philips Videopac+ (O2EM)
addons.description:
O2EM is an Odyssey² / VideoPac emulator.

Place o2rom.bin (required) in your userdata folder.

addons.name: Mattel - Intellivision (FreeIntv)
addons.description: FreeIntv is a libretro emulation core for the Mattel Intellivision designed for joypad compatibility.

addons.name: Microsoft - MSX (fMSX)
addons.description: fMSX is a MSX emulator written by Marat Fayzullin. It emulates MSX, MSX2, and MSX2+ 8-bit home computers.
addons.disclaimer: 图片来源：Garage Research 模拟器

addons.name: Minecraft (Craft)
addons.description: Craft is a simple Minecraft clone written in C using modern OpenGL.
addons.disclaimer: 图片来源：Aaron Smith

addons.name: Mr.Boom (Bomberman)
addons.description: Mr.Boom is a freeware 8-player Bomberman clone. It features pushing bombs, remote controls, kangaroo riding, and more.

addons.name: MSX/SVI/ColecoVision/SG-1000 (blueMSX)
addons.description: BlueMSX is a rich MSX emulator. It supports most common machines and a wide variety of extension hardware.
addons.disclaimer: 作者：Daniel Vik、Benoit Delvaux、Tomas Karlsson、Johan van Leur、Ricardo Bittencourt 和 Ray Zero

addons.name: NEC - PC Engine / CD (Beetle PCE FAST)
addons.summary: NEC - PC Engine / CD (Beetle PCE FAST)
addons.description:
Beetle PC Engine Fast is a fork of Mednafen's PC Engine Fast driver.

Compared to Beetle PC Engine, the fast version trades away typically unnecessary accuracy in favor of speed.
addons.snippet: NEC - PC Engine / CD (Beetle PCE FAST)

addons.name: NEC - PC Engine / SuperGrafx / CD (Beetle PCE)
addons.summary: NEC - PC Engine / SuperGrafx / CD (Beetle PCE)
addons.description:
Beetle PC Engine is a fork of Mednafen's PC Engine driver.

This PC Engine module is more accurate than the Beetle PC Engine Fast module, at the expense of speed.
addons.snippet: NEC - PC Engine / SuperGrafx / CD (Beetle PCE)

addons.name: NEC - PC Engine SuperGrafx (Beetle SuperGrafx)
addons.description: Beetle SuperGrafx is a PC Engine emulator. It was ported from Mednafen PCE Fast to libretro.

addons.name: NEC - PC-8000 / PC-8800 series (QUASI88)
addons.description: QUASI88 is an emulator by Showzoh Fukunaga licensed under the BSD 3-Clause license. QUASI88 uses code from MAME, XMAME and fmgen.
addons.disclaimer: 图片来源：NEC Retro

addons.name: NEC - PC-98 (Neko Project II)
addons.description:
Neko Project II is an excellent PC-98 emulator.

PC-98 is a lineup of Japanese 16-bit and 32-bit personal computers manufactured by NEC from 1982 to 2000.

addons.name: NEC - PC-FX (Beetle PC-FX)
addons.description: Beetle PC-FX is a port of the Mednafen PC-FX video game system emulator for the NEC PC-FX.

addons.name: Nintendo - DS (DeSmuME 2015)
addons.description: A port of DeSmuME to libretro based on DeSmuME SVN, circa 2015.

addons.name: Nintendo - DS (DeSmuME)
addons.description:
DeSmuME is software that allows you to emulate a Nintendo DS system.

Special thanks to: yopyop (original author of DeSmuME), for releasing the source code of this great emulator; Martin Korth (author of GBATEK), for his well-written Gameboy Advance and Nintendo DS documentation.

Supported files: .nds, .bin
addons.disclaimer: 特别感谢 yopyop（DeSmuME的原作者）和 Martin Korth（GBATEK 的作者）

addons.name: Nintendo - DS (melonDS)
addons.description: melonDS aims at providing fast and accurate Nintendo DS emulation.

addons.name: Nintendo - Game Boy / Color (Gambatte)
addons.description: Gambatte is an accuracy-focused, open-source, cross-platform Game Boy Color emulator written in C++.
addons.disclaimer: Game Boy 和 Game Boy Color 是美国任天堂股份有限公司的注册商标。Gambatte 与上述任何公司均无关联或背书。

addons.name: Nintendo - Game Boy / Color (Gearboy)
addons.description: Gearboy is a Nintendo Game Boy / Game Boy Color emulator that runs on iOS, Raspberry Pi, Mac, Windows, Linux and RetroArch.

addons.name: Nintendo - Game Boy / Color (SameBoy)
addons.description: SameBoy is an open source Gameboy (DMG) and Gameboy Color (CGB) emulator, written in portable C.

addons.name: Nintendo - Game Boy / Color (TGB Dual)
addons.description: TGB Dual is an open source GB/GBC emulator with game link cable support.

addons.name: Nintendo - Game Boy Advance (Beetle GBA)
addons.description: Beetle GBA is a fork of Mednafen's GBA core for the libretro project.

addons.name: Nintendo - Game Boy Advance (gpSP)
addons.description: gpSP is a Game Boy Advance emulator based on notaz's fork of gpSP with additional codebase improvements.

addons.name: Nintendo - Game Boy Advance (Meteor)
addons.description: Meteor is a Nintendo Gameboy Advance emulator.
addons.disclaimer: 作者：Philippe Daouadi（p.daouadi@free.fr)，Hans Kristian Arntzen（maister@archlinux.us）

addons.name: Nintendo - Game Boy Advance (mGBA)
addons.description: mGBA aims to be faster and more accurate than many existing Game Boy Advance emulators, as well as adding features that other emulators lack.

addons.name: Nintendo - Game Boy Advance (VBA Next)
addons.description: VBA-Next is a fork from the now inactive VisualBoy Advance project, with goals to improve the compatibility and features of the emulator.

addons.name: Nintendo - Game Boy Advance (VBA-M)
addons.description: VBA-M is a Nintendo Game Boy and Game Boy Advance emulator based on the official VisualBoyAdvance by Forgotten and the VBA development team.

addons.name: Nintendo - GameCube / Wii (Dolphin)
addons.description:
Source: https://github.com/libretro/dolphin

Supported files: .elf, .dol, .gcm, .iso, .tgc, .wbfs, .ciso, .gcz, .wad

addons.name: Nintendo - NES / Famicom (bnes)
addons.description: A libretro port of bNES, a NES emulator originally created by Byuu.
addons.disclaimer: 怀念 Near / Byuu

addons.name: Nintendo - NES / Famicom (FCEUmm)
addons.description:
FCEUmm emulates NES, Famicom, and Famicom Disk System (FDS) platforms.

FCEUmm merges elements from FCEU Ultra, FCEU rerecording, FCEUXD, FCEUXDSP, FCEUXDSP CE, and FCEU-mm into a single branch of FCEU.
addons.disclaimer: 图标来源：Anarkhya（anarkhya.deviantart.com）

addons.name: Nintendo - NES / Famicom (Mesen)
addons.description:
Mesen is a high-accuracy NES emulator for Windows and Linux.

Mesen offers numerous features, such as save states, video filters, netplay, rewinding, overclocking, cheat codes and HD packs.

addons.name: Nintendo - NES / Famicom (Nestopia)
addons.description: Nestopia is a portable open source NES/Famicom emulator. It is designed to be as accurate as possible and supports a large number of peripherals.
addons.disclaimer: 图标来源：Anarkhya（anarkhya.deviantart.com）

addons.name: Nintendo - NES / Famicom (QuickNES)
addons.description: A port of the QuickNES core library, originally by Shay Green, heavily modified. QuickNES is a newer emulator that seems to have good compatibility.

addons.name: Nintendo - Nintendo 64 (Mupen64Plus)
addons.description: Mupen64 is an N64 emulator desgined to be multi-OS. It uses a plugin system and is highly compatible.
addons.lifecyclestate: This add-on has been renamed.

addons.name: Nintendo - Nintendo 64 (Mupen64Plus-Next)
addons.description: Mupen64 is an N64 emulator desgined to be multi-OS. It uses a plugin system and is highly compatible.

addons.name: Nintendo - Nintendo 64 (ParaLLEl N64)
addons.description: ParaLLEl N64 is an optimized/rewritten Nintendo 64 emulator based on Mupen64 Plus. It was made specifically for Libretro.

addons.name: Nintendo - Pokemon Mini (PokeMini)
addons.description:
PokeMini emulates the obscure Pokémon Mini handheld. While functional, it does not support color files or savestates currently.

To use a real BIOS, place bios.min in the emulator's userdata folder.

addons.name: Nintendo - SNES / SFC (Beetle bsnes)
addons.description: Beetle bSNES is the SNES module of Beetle, a fork of Mednafen. Mednafen's SNES module itself is a fork of bSNES v0.59.
addons.disclaimer: 怀念 Near / Byuu

addons.name: Nintendo - SNES / SFC (Beetle Supafaust)
addons.description: Supafaust is a SNES emulator for multicore ARM Linux platforms. It is particularly suitable for low-end devices.

addons.name: Nintendo - SNES / SFC (bsnes 2014 Accuracy)
addons.description:
A libretro fork of bSNES. As close to upstream as possible.

The Accuracy profile focuses on accuracy at the cost of performance.
addons.disclaimer: 怀念 Near / Byuu

addons.name: Nintendo - SNES / SFC (bsnes 2014 Balanced)
addons.description:
A libretro fork of bSNES. As close to upstream as possible.

The Balanced profile is a good compromise between accuracy and performance.
addons.disclaimer: 怀念 Near / Byuu

addons.name: Nintendo - SNES / SFC (bsnes 2014 Performance)
addons.description:
A libretro fork of bSNES. As close to upstream as possible.

The Performance profile focuses more on execution speed than on accuracy.
addons.disclaimer: 怀念 Near / Byuu

addons.name: Nintendo - SNES / SFC (bsnes)
addons.description: bsnes is a multi-platform Super Nintendo (Super Famicom) emulator from Near / Byuu that focuses on performance, features, and ease of use.
addons.disclaimer: 怀念 Near / Byuu

addons.name: Nintendo - SNES / SFC (bsnes-hd beta)
addons.description: bsnes-hd is a fork of bsnes that adds HD video features.
addons.disclaimer: 怀念 Near / Byuu

addons.name: Nintendo - SNES / SFC (bsnes-mercury Accuracy)
addons.description:
bSNES Mercury is a fork of Higan (originally called bSNES), notable for emulating the original hardware as accurately as possible through low-level, cycle-accurate emulation.

The Accuracy profile focuses on accuracy at the cost of performance.
addons.disclaimer: 怀念 Near / Byuu

addons.name: Nintendo - SNES / SFC (bsnes-mercury Balanced)
addons.description:
bSNES Mercury is a fork of Higan (originally called bSNES), notable for emulating the original hardware as accurately as possible through low-level, cycle-accurate emulation.

The Balanced profile is a good compromise between accuracy and performance.
addons.disclaimer: 怀念 Near / Byuu

addons.name: Nintendo - SNES / SFC (bsnes-mercury Performance)
addons.description:
bSNES Mercury is a fork of Higan (originally called bSNES), notable for emulating the original hardware as accurately as possible through low-level, cycle-accurate emulation.

The Performance profile focuses more on execution speed than on accuracy.
addons.disclaimer: 怀念 Near / Byuu

addons.name: Nintendo - SNES / SFC (Snes9x 2002)
addons.description: A port of SNES9x 1.39 for libretro. Previously called PocketSNES, this emulator is heavily optimized for ARM.

addons.name: Nintendo - SNES / SFC (Snes9x 2010)
addons.description: A port of Snes9x 1.52+ to Libretro. Rewritten in C with several optimizations and speedhacks.
addons.disclaimer: 图标来源：HarryBana（harrybana.deviantart.com）

addons.name: Nintendo - SNES / SFC (Snes9x)
addons.description:
Snes9x is a portable, freeware SNES and Super Famicom emulator.

Snes9x is coded in C++, with three assembler CPU emulation cores on the i386 Linux and Windows ports.
addons.disclaimer: Snes9X 团队与上述任何公司均无任何关联。Snes9X 团队的意见并不反映此处提到的各个公司的意见。公司和与该公司相关的所有产品均为该公司的商标。请联系该公司获取商标和版权信息。

addons.name: Nintendo - SNES / SFC / Game Boy / Color (Mesen-S)
addons.summary: Nintendo - SNES / SFC / Game Boy / Color (Mesen-S)
addons.description: Mesen-S is a cross-platform SNES emulator for Windows and Linux built in C++ and C#.
addons.snippet: Nintendo - SNES / SFC / Game Boy / Color (Mesen-S)

addons.name: Nintendo - Virtual Boy (Beetle VB)
addons.description: Beetle VB emulates the Nintendo Virtual Boy, a tabletop video game console capable of displaying stereoscopic 3D graphics.

addons.name: Oberon RISC Emulator
addons.description:
An emulator for the Oberon RISC machine.

The Oberon System was designed and implemented in 1990 by professor Niklaus Wirth. It was intended for teaching computer essentials.

addons.name: Palm OS (Mu)

authors.name: guicrith / meepingsnesroms; Stephanie Gawroriski (Xer Shadow Tail)

addons.description:
Mu is a new Palm OS emulator targeting compatibility, speed and accuracy in that order.

Note: The BIOS files palmos41-en-m515.rom and palmos52-en-t3.rom are needed.

addons.name: PICO-8 (Retro8)
addons.description:
Retro8 is an open source implementation of the PICO-8 Fantasy Console.

Much of the PICO-8 API is working with good performance, including basic sound and music, though it is still missing some obscure Lua extension quirks and fixed arithmetic support.

addons.name: PocketCDG
addons.description: PocketCDG is an MP3 karaoke music player.

addons.name: PSP RemotePlay (RemoteJoy)
addons.description:
Remote Joy allows the user to stream the PSP screen to their computer.

Supported files: .exe

addons.name: Quake (TyrQuake)
addons.description: Tyr-Quake is a branch of the Quake source code released by id Software. It is intended to support Quake and Quakeworld while fixing little bugs that have come up over the years.

addons.name: Rick Dangerous (XRick)
addons.description: XRick is an open source implementation of the legendary game Rick Dangerous.

addons.name: ScummVM
addons.description: ScummVM is a collection of game engine recreations. ScummVM emulates several systems, including the SCUMM system for LucasArts adventure games.

addons.name: Sega - Dreamcast/Naomi (Flycast)
addons.description: Flycast is a fork of Reicast, a multi-platform Sega Dreamcast emulator.

addons.name: Sega - Dreamcast/Naomi (Flycast)
addons.lifecycle: This add-on has been renamed from Reicast to Flycast.
addons.description:
Reicast is a multiplatform Sega Dreamcast emulator (http://reicast.com).

Supported files: chd, cdi, iso, elf, bin, cue, gdi
addons.lifecyclestate: This add-on has been renamed from Reicast to Flycast.
addons.disclaimer: The Reicast team is not connected or affiliated with any mentioned company in any way. The opinions of the Reicast team do not reflect the views of the various companies mentioned here. Companies and all products pertaining to that company are trademarks of that company. Please contact that company for trademark and copyright information.

addons.name: Sega - Mega Drive - Genesis (BlastEm)
addons.description: BlastEm is an open source, higly accurate emulator for the Genesis/Megadrive that runs on modest hardware.

addons.name: Sega - MS/GG (SMS Plus GX)
addons.description: SMS Plus GX is a port of the original Sega Master System emulator for the Nintendo GameCube.
addons.disclaimer: gameblabla 将其移植到 libretro

addons.name: Sega - MS/GG/MD/CD (Genesis Plus GX Wide)
addons.description: A widescreen modification of Genesis Plus GX, a Sega/Genesis/Mega CD emulator that originally ran on the GameCube.

addons.name: Sega - MS/GG/MD/CD (Genesis Plus GX)
addons.description:
Genesis Plus GX is an enhanced port of Genesis Plus to the libretro API.

Features support for SG-1000, Mark-III, Master System, Game Gear, Mega Drive and Mega CD hardware.
addons.disclaimer: 特别感谢 twinaphex 从 GX 版本中移植了增强功能

addons.name: Sega - MS/GG/MD/CD/32X (PicoDrive)
addons.description: PicoDrive is yet another Sega Game Gear / Master System / Mega Drive / Mega CD / 32X emulator heavily optimized for ARM.
addons.disclaimer: 作者：Dave（又名 fdave，FinalBurn 作者）和 notaz

addons.name: Sega - MS/GG/SG-1000 (Gearsystem)
addons.description: Gearsystem is an open source, cross-platform, Sega Master System / Game Gear / SG-1000 / Othello Multivision emulator.

addons.name: Sega - Saturn (Beetle Saturn)
addons.description: Beetle Saturn is a port of Mednafen Saturn to the libretro API.

addons.name: Sega - Saturn (Yabause)
addons.description: Yabause stands for Yet Another Buggy And Uncomplete Saturn Emulator. Yabause can boot Sega Saturn bios and games, some of which are playable.
addons.disclaimer: 图标来源：Anarkhya（anarkhya.deviantart.com）

addons.name: Sharp - X68000 (PX68k)
addons.description: PX68k is a portable SHARP X68000 Emulator for PSP, Android and other platforms.

addons.name: Sharp X1 (X Millennium)
addons.description: X millennium was born in the late 1990s as X1R, a real-time mode fork of X1EMU.

addons.name: Sinclair - ZX 81 (EightyOne)
addons.description: EightyOne is an emulator for the range of home computers made by Sinclair Research (and their clones) in the 1980s.

addons.name: Sinclair - ZX Spectrum (Fuse)
addons.description: Fuse (the Free Unix Spectrum Emulator) was originally a ZX Spectrum emulator for Unix. It has since been ported to Mac OS X, Windows, the Wii, AmigaOS and MorphOS.

addons.name: SNK - Neo Geo CD (NeoCD)
addons.description: NeoCD for libretro is complete rewrite of the NeoCD emulator in modern C++11.

addons.name: SNK - Neo Geo Pocket / Color (Beetle NeoPop)
addons.summary: SNK - Neo Geo Pocket / Color (Beetle NeoPop)
addons.description: Based on NeoPop, this emulator is sufficient to play most commercially released games fairly well, but not very accurate in terms of low-level details.
addons.snippet: SNK - Neo Geo Pocket / Color (Beetle NeoPop)

addons.name: SNK - Neo Geo Pocket / Color (RACE)
addons.description: RACE is a Neo Geo Pocket (NGP) and Neo Geo Pocket Color (NGPC) emulator for multiple platforms.

addons.name: Sony - PlayStation (Beetle PSX)
addons.description: Beetle PSX is the PlayStation module of Beetle, a port of Madnafen.

addons.name: Sony - PlayStation (PCSX ReARMed)
addons.description:
PCSX ReARMed is another PCSX fork based on the PCSX-Reloaded project, which itself contains code from PCSX, PCSX-df and PCSX-Revolution.

This version features a MIPS-to-ARM recompiler, NEON GTE code and more performance improvements.

addons.name: Sony - PlayStation (SwanStation)
addons.description: Swanstation is a fast PlayStation 1 emulator for PC and Android.

addons.name: Test Core - 3D Engine
addons.description: A tech demo for libretro GL with additional features (camera/location/etc).

addons.name: The 3DO Company - 3DO (4DO)
addons.lifecycle: This add-on has been renamed from 4do to Opera.
addons.description:
4DO emulates the 3DO Interactive Multiplayer video game system, often called simply the 3DO.

4DO is based on the FreeDO source code.
addons.lifecyclestate: This add-on has been renamed from 4do to Opera.

addons.name: The 3DO Company - 3DO (Opera)
addons.description:
Opera emulates the 1993 3DO Interactive Multiplayer video game system, pronounced 3-D-Oh.

Opera is a fork of 4DO, which is based on the FreeDO source code.

addons.name: The Powder Toy
addons.description: The Powder Toy is a desktop version of the classic "falling sand" physics game. It simulates air pressure and velocity as well as heat!

addons.name: Thomson - MO/TO (Theodore)
addons.description:
Theodore is an emulator for Thomson MO/TO computers.

Thomson MO/TO is a family of 8-bit home computers produced by French company Thomson SA between 1982 and 1989.

addons.name: Tomb Raider (OpenLara)
addons.description: OpenLara is a Classic Tomb Raider open-source engine. It was inspired by the OpenTomb project.

addons.name: Uzebox (Uzem)
addons.description: Uzem is the official emulator for the Uzebox (a retro-minimalist 8-bit open source game console).

addons.name: VeMUlator
addons.description: A port of the SEGA Visual Memory Unit emulator VeMUlator for libretro.

addons.name: Watara - Supervision (Potator)
addons.description:
Potator is a Watara SuperVision emulator.

To use this emulator, you must have compatibles ROMs with .sv and .bin extensions.

addons.name: Wolfenstein 3D (ECWolf)
addons.description: ECWolf is an advanced source port for Wolfenstein 3D, Spear of Destiny, and Super 3D Noah's Ark based off of the Wolf4SDL code base.

addons.name: Arctic Zephyr: From Ashes UI Audio Suite
Embuary Sounds
addons.description: To simulate the sound theme of EmbyTheater

addons.description: TetradUI GUI sounds for Kodi

addons.summary: Channel logos and artwork used in Catch-up TV & More
addons.description: Channel logos and artwork used in Catch-up TV & More

[Add/Updates] Some new logos and update existing logos

addons.name: Classification Icons - Colour
addons.description: Colour square aspect (64x64) video classification icons for use with MPAA ListItem in Kodi. Can be used by Kodi skins using skin variables to show icons or the much quicker $INFO as a texture method. Details of usage and supported icons in the README.md file.

addons.summary: Logos and artwork for the iPlayer WWW add-on
addons.description: This add-on contains logs and other artwork used in the iPlayer WWW add-on for Kodi.
addons.disclaimer: This add-on is not an official BBC product. All content was created by the providers or otherwise mentioned individuals.

v1.0.0

addons.name: Language Flags Complete Pack
addons.description: This add-on contains all of the language flags Kodi needs. All of the Kodi supported languages have been taken into account and if there's a flag and a code for it it's in here. I used https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-2_codes as a reference for the codes.

addons.name: HEIF image decoder
addons.description:
High Efficiency Image File Format (HEIF) is a file format employing HEVC (h.265) image coding for the best compression ratios currently possible.

Support for this is provided by ISO/IEC 23008-12:2017 compliant libheif.

addons.name: libraw image decoder
addons.description: Addon based on LibRaw for reading RAW files obtained from digital photo cameras (CRW/CR2, NEF, RAF, DNG, MOS, KDC, DCR and others; virtually all RAW formats are supported).

addons.name: MPO image decoder
addons.description: An addon to decode MPO (multiple picture object) files. These are used mainly for 3D cameras and the Nintendo 3DS.

addons.name: CU LRC Lyrics
addons.description: CU LRC Lyrics is a lyrics script for Kodi. It supports regular as well as LRC Lyrics. The script can search synchronized/unsynchronized lyrics embedded, from file or by scrapers. It can read .lrc/.txt lyrics file saved at the same path by same file name with .mp3(or other type of music).

addons.description: themoviedb.org is a free and open movie database. It's completely user driven by people like you. TMDb is currently used by millions of people every month and with their powerful API, it is also used by many popular media centers like Kodi to retrieve Movie Metadata, Posters and Fanart to enrich the user's experience.

addons.name: The TVDB v4 (Movies)
addons.summary: Fetch TV show and Movie metadata from TheTVDB.com
addons.description: TheTVDB.com plugin is a TV scraper built on one of the longest-running community-driven TV and Movie databases. With content metadata available for hundreds of thousands of TV shows and Movies, the site is a complete and accurate source for streamlining the metadata in your Kodi library. TheTVDB is free to access and is actively maintained by the thousands of community members that contribute to it.
addons.news: - 1.0.11: Turn on reuselanguageinvoker
addons.snippet: Fetch TV show and Movie metadata from TheTVDB.com

addons.name: Universal Movie Scraper
addons.description: Universal Scraper is currently the most customizable scraper by collecting information from the following supported sites: IMDb, themoviedb.org, Rotten Tomatoes, OFDb.de, fanart.tv, port.hu. This scraper is currently the flagship of the Team-Kodi scrapers. The initial search can be done either on TMDb or IMDb (according to the settings), but following that it can be set field by field that from which site you want that specific information.

addons.name: Google Drive
addons.description:
Play all your media from Google Drive including Videos, Music and Pictures (including Google Photos).
 - Unlimited number of accounts.
 - Team Drives support
 - Google Photos support
 - Search over your drive.
 - Auto-Refreshed slideshow.
 - Export your videos to your library (.strm files)
 - Use Google Drive as a source. **(Not currently working due to changes in the Google Drive API)
 - This program is not affiliated with or sponsored by Google.
addons.news:
v1.5.0 released Jan 21, 2023:
- Kodi 20 fix
addons.disclaimer:
This cloud drive addon uses a third-party authentication mechanism commonly known as OAuth 2.0.
If you want to know more about OAuth 2.0 you can visit the following pages:
- https://oauth.net/2/
- https://developers.google.com/identity/protocols/OAuth2
- https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/onedrive/developer/rest-api/getting-started/msa-oauth

Kodi and myself take no responsibility or liability.

The authentication server URL is specified in Settings / Advanced / Sign-in Server. The Sign-in Server implements the OAuth 2.0 protocol.
The complete source code of the Sign-in Server can be download here: https://github.com/cguZZman/drive-login
You can clone the project and host it in your own server.

addons.name: indigiTUBE
addons.summary: Unofficial plugin for indigiTUBE: the Australian national media platform by and for First Nations people.
addons.description: indigiTUBE (www.indigitube.com.au) connects and supports the preservation of language and culture for our future generations. A living modern midden where technology and culture are woven together. indigiTUBE gathers First Nations stories from the desert to the sea, connecting and sharing culture from our extremely remote to urban regions; from our fresh new talent to archived histories. indigiTUBE is a digital meeting place for First Nations song, dance, language and lore; creating a unified space to share our evolving and living culture. It also live streams 27 different radio stations to hear what's going on around the country. The visually stunning media platform reflects the rich culture of our First Nations people, and the vibrant colours represent ochre, land and sea.
addons.news:
v1.0.0
- Initial release, with content from the homepage including radio, albums, videos and more
addons.snippet: Unofficial plugin for indigiTUBE: the Australian national media platform by and for First Nations people.

addons.name: Switchback
addons.summary: Switchback is a Kodi utility for fast switching between recently played media.
addons.description:
Kodi utility for fast switching between recently played media.
Keeps a list of recently played videos.
The primary intended use is to make for super easy Switchback between two in progress video. See Wiki for usage notes including how to bind remote/keyboard controls for instant Switchback.
Consider this scenario:
* You're watching 'video A' with your partner. You're interrupted, and your partner needs to tend to the kids/howl at the moon.
* You navigate to 'video B' and watch some of that while you're waiting.
* Your partner comes back.
* You hit your one button 'Switchback' and 'video A' instantly starts playing again - no need for tedious navigation etc.
* You're interrupted, again! The moon really is so very bright tonight. Hit your 'Switchback' button to instantly resume 'video B', again with no tedious navigation.
addons.news:
v2.0.0 Re-write!
- Support addons
- Support PVR live/recordings
- (Remove music support)
- Add context menus (configurable)
- Better artwork support
- Better notifications
- Filter watched items from list (configurable)
addons.snippet: Switchback is a Kodi utility for fast switching between recently played media.

addons.name: Triple R
addons.summary: Listen to Triple R: an independent community radio station in Melbourne, Australia.
addons.description: For more than 40 years Triple R has shaped and inspired the culture of Melbourne. Since its inception as an educational broadcaster in 1976, Triple R has become Australia's most influential community radio station with nearly 21,000 paid subscribers and broadcasting live to over 1,000,000 listeners per month across FM and digital (DAB+ digital radio, podcasts and online). Broadcasting on 102.7FM and 3RRR Digital, the Triple R grid houses over 60 diverse programs. Music shows cover every genre imaginable from pop to punk rock, from R&B and electro to jazz, hip hop, country and metal. Specialist talks programs delve into topics as varied as the environment, human rights, politics, medical issues, gardening, cultural ventures and local interests.
addons.news:

- More content added from website

- Broadcast track playlists are available

- Subscriber-only giveaways can now be entered by signing in
addons.snippet: Listen to Triple R: an independent community radio station in Melbourne, Australia.

You can clone the project and host it in your own server.

This cloud drive addon uses a third-party authentication mechanism commonly known as OAuth 2.0.
If you want to know more about OAuth 2.0 you can visit the following pages:
- https://oauth.net/2/
- https://developers.google.com/identity/protocols/OAuth2
- https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/onedrive/developer/rest-api/getting-started/msa-oauth

Kodi and myself take no responsibility or liability.

The authentication server URL is specified in Settings / Advanced / Sign-in Server. The Sign-in Server implements the OAuth 2.0 protocol.
The complete source code of the Sign-in Server can be download here: https://github.com/cguZZman/drive-login
You can clone the project and host it in your own server.

This add-on is not officially commissioned/supported by HBO®. The trademark HBO® Go is registered by Home Box Office, Inc. 
For more information on HBO® Go visit the official HBO® Go website for your region.
I do not own any of the content this add-on lists. The content belongs to Home Box Office, Inc. 
All this add-on does is make simple HTTP requests to Hbo go servers to retrieve and display content just like any web browser would do!

Important: HBO® Go must be paid for!!! You need a valid HBO® Go account for the add-on to work! Register on the official HBO® Go website for your region

THERE IS NO WARRANTY FOR THE ADD-ON, IT MIGHT NOT WORK AT ALL AND IT CAN BREAK AND STOP WORKING AT ANY TIME.

If an official app is available for your platform, use it instead of this.

addons.name: indigiTUBE
addons.summary: Unofficial plugin for indigiTUBE: the Australian national media platform by and for First Nations people.
addons.description: indigiTUBE (www.indigitube.com.au) connects and supports the preservation of language and culture for our future generations. A living modern midden where technology and culture are woven together. indigiTUBE gathers First Nations stories from the desert to the sea, connecting and sharing culture from our extremely remote to urban regions; from our fresh new talent to archived histories. indigiTUBE is a digital meeting place for First Nations song, dance, language and lore; creating a unified space to share our evolving and living culture. It also live streams 27 different radio stations to hear what's going on around the country. The visually stunning media platform reflects the rich culture of our First Nations people, and the vibrant colours represent ochre, land and sea.
addons.news:
v1.0.0

addons.snippet: Unofficial plugin for indigiTUBE: the Australian national media platform by and for First Nations people.

The complete source code of the Sign-in Server can be download here: https://github.com/cguZZman/drive-login
You can clone the project and host it in your own server.

Some channels that are included are: NPO Start, Kijk.nl (SBS6, NET5, Veronica, SBS9), RTL XL, NOS, Nickelodeon, AT5, Omroep Flevoland, L1, RTV Drenthe, RTV Oost, RTV Noord, RTV Noord-Holland, RTV Rijnmond, Omroep West, Omroep Gelderland, Omroep Brabant, Omrop Fryslân, WOS, DTV, Omroep Venlo Omroep Horst aan de Maas, Studio 040, RTV Utrecht, Omroep Zeeland, Eén, Vier, VRT.nu, VTM, Stieve, Ketnet, DPlay, SVT, ViaFree, Viasat, UR Play, MTV, NRK, BBC, Dumpert, Fox Sports, Pathé Nederland, Hardware.info and Ons.

More information can be found at https://github.com/retrospect-addon/plugin.video.retrospect or the Retrospect wiki at https://github.com/retrospect-addon/plugin.video.retrospect/wiki/.

addons.name: Switchback
addons.summary: Switchback is a Kodi utility for fast switching between recently played media.
addons.description:
Kodi utility for fast switching between recently played media.
Keeps a list of recently played videos.
The primary intended use is to make for super easy Switchback between two in progress video. See Wiki for usage notes including how to bind remote/keyboard controls for instant Switchback.
Consider this scenario:
* You're watching 'video A' with your partner. You're interrupted, and your partner needs to tend to the kids/howl at the moon.
* You navigate to 'video B' and watch some of that while you're waiting.
* Your partner comes back.
* You hit your one button 'Switchback' and 'video A' instantly starts playing again - no need for tedious navigation etc.
* You're interrupted, again! The moon really is so very bright tonight. Hit your 'Switchback' button to instantly resume 'video B', again with no tedious navigation.
addons.news:
v2.0.0 Re-write!
- Support addons
- Support PVR live/recordings
- (Remove music support)
- Add context menus (configurable)
- Better artwork support
- Better notifications
- Filter watched items from list (configurable)
addons.snippet: Switchback is a Kodi utility for fast switching between recently played media.

addons.description: For more than 40 years Triple R has shaped and inspired the culture of Melbourne. Since its inception as an educational broadcaster in 1976, Triple R has become Australia's most influential community radio station with nearly 21,000 paid subscribers and broadcasting live to over 1,000,000 listeners per month across FM and digital (DAB+ digital radio, podcasts and online). Broadcasting on 102.7FM and 3RRR Digital, the Triple R grid houses over 60 diverse programs. Music shows cover every genre imaginable from pop to punk rock, from R&B and electro to jazz, hip hop, country and metal. Specialist talks programs delve into topics as varied as the environment, human rights, politics, medical issues, gardening, cultural ventures and local interests.
addons.news:
Version 3.0.0
- Rewritten with more flexible parser
- More content added from website
- Improved user interface and menus
- Browsing programs by name and date now possible
- Broadcast track playlists are available
- Support for playing music through Bandcamp, YouTube and indigiTUBE
- Support for searching for music content by title and artist
- Subscriber-only giveaways can now be entered by signing in
addons.snippet: Listen to Triple R: an independent community radio station in Melbourne, Australia.

addons.summary: Watch screencasts about Vim, the text editor, from http://vimcasts.org
addons.description:
Vimcasts publishes free screencasts about Vim, the text editor. Vim has been around in one form or another for over 20 years. The learning curve is famously difficult, but those who manage to climb it insist that nothing can match Vim's modal editing model for speed and efficiency.

The patterns of use that make a Vim master productive are not easily discovered. Trial and error will get you so far, but the best way to learn is to watch an experienced Vim user at work. By providing short videos with digestible advice, Vimcasts gives you something you can take away and use immediately to improve your productivity. Vimcasts aims to be the expert Vim colleague you never had.

Vimcasts is produced by Drew Neil (aka nelstrom), who came to Vim from TextMate. He made the switch when starting work at a company that uses Linux workstations. His choice of text editor was influenced by colleagues.
addons.snippet: Watch screencasts about Vim, the text editor, from http://vimcasts.org

addons.name: Where Are You
addons.news:
v.0.6.1
- added option to bypass dialog asking if you want to launch the streaming service
- if using HA control and an AppleTV, can pass video URL to launch episode/movie directly
addons.summary: Plugin module to display a custom dialog box when playing external media.
addons.description: Where Are You is a plugin for Kodi that accepts a URL from a stream file and then displays a dialog box with the title and message from the stream file URL.  Can also trigger Home Assistant script (including passing a URL to HA to directly launch a streaming app on an AppleTV or Andriod device) or Harmony Remote actions.  After the dialog is dismissed a black video plays for 2 seconds.  This is basically to do what the media stub file does (which is display a title and a message for a given file), but for streaming files because the media stub only works if you have an optical drive attached to the device running Kodi.
addons.snippet: Plugin module to display a custom dialog box when playing external media.

addons.name: Yelo
addons.summary: Stream live streams from Yelo Play
addons.description: This plugin makes it possible to watch live streams that are available on the Telenet Yelo application for your region.
addons.disclaimer:
I do not own any of the listed content on this plugin.
            The content belongs to Telenet N.V. All this plugin does is make simple HTTP requests to their servers to retrieve content just like any browser like Chrome, Firefox etc. would do!

            There is nothing illegal going on, as this plugin uses inputstream.adaptive to handle DRM content. Like any browser the inputstream.adaptive plugin is using widevine to complete the transaction.

            Without a valid Telenet subscription this plugin is useless for you!
